entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn is a character who seems to be more interested in finding valuable treasures than listening to Hagrid.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and seems to be nonchalant about the value of unicorn hair.

entities.name: unicorn
entities.description: Unicorns are mentioned as having their tails caught on branches in the Forest.

relationships.description: Slughorn is looking at Hagrid, who is standing near the ceiling with a long, silky skein of bright white hair hanging from it.
